value.title: StarCraft 2: FINALLY New Maps - But Are They Any Good?
value.excerpt: New ladder maps are finally available for StarCraft 2. In this video I give my initial impressions on Berlingrad LE, Curious Minds LE, Glittering Ashes LE, Hardwire LE and Pride of Altaris LE.
